name: Gun Game (itch) (lew)
description:
This Game Was Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Inspired by Old FPS Games Modes, Gun Game is a fast-paced, 2D Shooter with Randomness in its core. Every 20 Seconds you are given a random Gun or Modifier whilst many enemies and bosses come to take you out. Positive or Negative, the hand you're dealt is the one you play with and their is no changing until the next 'Roll of the Dice'.

How to Play

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shooting

LShift - Some Modifiers

P - Pause

Features
  • 5 Guns
  • 6 Positive and Negative Modifiers
  • 5 Enemies
  • 3 Bosses
